note.p: Education: Durham School (left 1818); Peterhouse, Cambridge. BA (1822), MA (1827), MA (1844, Oxford); Inner Temple
Career: Bye Fellow, Peterhouse (1827); called to the Bar, Inner Temple (1832); practised on Northern Circuit; JP
Memberships: FLS (1823); FCPS; FRGS; Tyneside Naturalists' Field Club (President)
Notes: DNB says that he died on 16 Sep 1869 at Norton House, but does not indicate in which county.
